opinion.attorneys:
Stephen P. Nugent, Providence, for petitioner.
Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Marc DeSisto, Asst. Atty. Gen., for respondent.
opinion.opinion_text:
[1] ORDER [2] The petition for writ of certiorari is denied. The stay entered in this case on January 18, 1983 is hereby vacated.
[3] MURRAY, J., did not participate.
